posts.post_content: Anybody have a 1908 PC760 Rose Co Niles NYAL available?

[quote name="BuzzD" post=1795316]Anybody have a 1908 PC760 Rose Co Niles NYAL available?[/QUOTE]

Good luck with your search, but I am aware of only one example.
With a handle like Baseball Rarities, I expect you know!  I have Glade and Stahl and it would be nice to round out this trio of obscure NYAL

[quote name="BuzzD" post=1795329]With a handle like Baseball Rarities, I expect you know!  I have Glade and Stahl and it would be nice to round out this trio of obscure NYAL[/QUOTE]

Well, Glade and Stahl are extremely rare also. Since you have been able to locate those two, then I certainly would not put Niles past you.

Good luck with your search and I will keep an eye out for you.
